results.title: The Therapeutic Efficacy of Curcumin vs. Metformin in Modulating the Gut Microbiota in NAFLD Rats: A Comparative Study

results.title: Pharmacological Activity of Cha-Miang (Camellia sinensis var. assamica) in High Fat Diet-Induced Insulin-Resistant Rats.
results.text_hl: Histological analysis revealed decreased @<m>DISEASE_Fat_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005218 @@@hepatic fat@@@ accumulation, especially when extracts were concurrently treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Laoung-On J, Anuduang A, Saenjum C, Srichairatanakool S, Boonyapranai K, Ounjaijean S. Pharmacological Activity of Cha-Miang (Camellia sinensis var. assamica) in High Fat Diet-Induced Insulin-Resistant Rats. Life (Basel). 2024 Nov 20;14(11):. PMID: 39598313

results.title: Metformin for Rapidly Maturing Girls with Central Adiposity: Less Liver Fat and Slower Bone Maturation.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@-treated girls gained more height per bone-age year and had less @<m>DISEASE_Fat_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005218 @@@visceral and hepatic fat@@@.

citations.NLM: de Zegher F, García Beltrán C, López-Bermejo A, Ibáñez L. Metformin for Rapidly Maturing Girls with Central Adiposity: Less Liver Fat and Slower Bone Maturation. Horm Res Paediatr. 2018;89(2):136-140. PMID: 29131093
